FuncDef:
The traffic-policy atomic-update-mode command enables the device to provide nonstop services during MQC-based traffic classification rule modification.
The undo traffic-policy atomic-update-mode command cancels the configuration. The traffic-policy atomic-update-mode command enables the device to provide nonstop services during MQC-based traffic classification rule modification. The undo traffic-policy atomic-update-mode command cancels the configuration. By default, this function is disabled.
ExtraInfo: After this command is used, the system first delivers the modified traffic classification rules, and then deletes the old traffic classification rules. This ensures nonstop services.
